      static int[][] getWindowPixels(int x0, int y0, int imageWidth, int imageHeight, double sigmaX, double aspectRatio)

    • Method Detail

      • getWindowPixels

        public static int[][] getWindowPixels(int x0,
                                      int y0,
                                      int imageWidth,
                                      int imageHeight,
                                      double sigmaX,
                                      double aspectRatio)
        Generates a list of pixel (x,y) values that surround a fluorophore. The size of the window in the x dimension is 2*(5*sigmaX) and in the y dimension is 2*(5*sigmaX*aspectRatio), i.e., a window of 5 sigma.
        Parameters:
        x0 - - the x position of the centroid
        y0 - - the y position of the centroid
        imageWidth - - the width of the image
        imageHeight - - the height of the image
        sigmaX - - the sigma value, in the x-direction, for a 2D Gaussian distribution
        aspectRatio - - the aspect ratio for a 2D Gaussian, i.e. sigmaY/sigmaX
        Returns:
        X - a list of pixels that surrounds (x0,y0)
